text: Kenneth Thomas Jones (born 16 September 1948) is an English drummer. He is best known for his work in the groups Small Faces, Faces and the Who. Jones was honored into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2012 as a member of Small Faces/Faces. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * Kenney Jones' Small Faces Charitable Trust Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:English rock drummers Category:Musicians from London Category:The Who
title: Kenney Jones
